syllabus_info.title: Cambridge International AS & A Level Mathematics

learning_objectives.description: use the derivatives of eˣ, lnx, sinx, cosx, tanx, tan⁻¹x, together with constant multiples, sums, differences and composites
learning_objectives.notes_and_examples: Derivatives of sin⁻¹x and cos⁻¹x are not required.

learning_objectives.description: find and use the first derivative of a function which is defined parametrically or implicitly.
learning_objectives.notes_and_examples: e.g. x = t - e⁻²ᵗ, y = t + e²ᵗ. e.g. x² + y² = xy + 7. Including use in problems involving tangents and normals.
